Configure and Start a Set of Storage Nodes
Prev  Chapter 4. Configuring the KVStore  Next

Configure and Start a Set of Storage Nodes

You should already have configured and started a set of Storage Nodes to host the KVStore cluster. If not, you need to follow the instructions in Installing Oracle NoSQL Database before proceeding with this step.
